post.description: Add a refund to the order.

date.description: Specifies an order creation date in format Y-m-d H:i:s

item_restock.description: Boolean, whether or not to add the line items back to the store inventory.

items.description: Defines items in the order that will be shipped

message.description: Refund reason, or some else message which assigned to refund.

order_id.description: Defines the order for which the refund will be created.

send_notifications.description: Send notifications to customer after refund was created

post.description: Add a shipment to the order.

items.description: Defines items in the order that will be shipped

order_id.description: Defines the order for which the shipment will be created

send_notifications.description: Send notifications to customer after shipment was created

shipment_provider.description: Defines company name that provide tracking of shipment

tracking_numbers.description:
Defines shipment's tracking numbers that have to be added
How set tracking numbers to appropriate carrier:
  • tracking_numbers[]=a2c.demo1,a2c.demo2 - set default carrier
  • tracking_numbers[carrier_id]=a2c.demo - set appropriate carrier
To get the list of carriers IDs that are available in your store, use the cart.info method

get.description: Get list of shipments by orders.

parameters.description: Retrieves shipments specified by order id
parameters.name: order_id

parameters.description: This parameter sets the number from which you want to get entities
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: This parameter sets the entity amount that has to be retrieved
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Set this parameter in order to choose which entity fields you want to retrieve
parameters.name: params

parameters.description: Set this parameter in order to choose which entity fields you want to ignore. Works only if parameter `params` equal force_all
parameters.name: exclude

parameters.description: Retrieve entities from their creation date
parameters.name: created_from

parameters.description: Retrieve entities to their creation date
parameters.name: created_to

order_id.description: Defines the order that will be updated

shipment_id.description: Shipment id indicates the number of delivery

tracking_numbers.description:
Defines shipment's tracking numbers that have to be added
How set tracking numbers to appropriate carrier:
  • tracking_numbers[]=a2c.demo1,a2c.demo2 - set default carrier
  • tracking_numbers[carrier_id]=a2c.demo - set appropriate carrier
To get the list of carriers IDs that are available in your store, use the cart.info method

parameters.description: Defines the orders specified by order id
parameters.name: order_id

parameters.description: Defines store id where the order should be found
parameters.name: store_id

parameters.description: Defines new order's status
parameters.name: order_status

parameters.description: Specifies order comment
parameters.name: comment

parameters.description: Specifies order's  modification date
parameters.name: date_modified

parameters.description: Specifies order's  finished date
parameters.name: date_finished

parameters.description: Update order financial status to specified
parameters.name: financial_status

attribute_name.description: Defines product‚Äôs attribute name separated with a comma in Magento

attribute_set_name.description: Defines product‚Äôs attribute set name in Magento

available_for_sale.description: Specifies the set of visible/invisible products for sale

available_for_view.description: Specifies the set of visible/invisible products for users

best_offer.description:
The price at which Best Offers are automatically accepted.
Param structure:
best_offer[minimum_offer_price] = decimal
best_offer[auto_accept_price] = decimal

categories_ids.description: Defines product add that is specified by comma-separated categories id

condition.description: The human-readable label for the condition (e.g., "New").

created_at.description: Defines the date of entity creation

description.description: Defines product's description that has to be added

downloadable.description: Defines whether the product is downloadable

ean.description: European Article Number. An EAN is a unique 8 or 13-digit identifier that many industries (such as book publishers) use to identify products.

isbn.description: International Standard Book Number. An ISBN is a unique identifier for books.

listing_duration.description: Describes the number of days the seller wants the listing to be active.

listing_type.description: Indicates the selling format of the eBay listing.

meta_description.description: Defines unique meta description of a entity

meta_keywords.description: Defines unique meta keywords for each entity

meta_title.description: Defines unique meta title for each entity

model.description: Defines product's model that has to be added

name.description: Defines product's name that has to be added

ordered_count.description: Defines how many times the product was ordered

package_details.description:
If the seller is subscribed to "Business Policies", use the seller_profiles instead of the shipping_details, payment_methods and return_accepted params.
Param structure:
package_details[measure_unit] = string
Allowed measure_unit values: [English or Metric]
Default: Metric
package_details[weigh_unit] = string
Allowed weigh_unit values: [kg, g, lbs, oz]
package_details[package_depth] = decimal
package_details[package_length] = decimal
package_details[package_width] = decimal
package_details[weight_major] = decimal
package_details[weight_minor] = decimal
package_details[shipping_package] = string
See cart.info method, param `eBay_shipping_package_details`

payment_methods.description:
Identifies the payment method (such as PayPal) that the seller will accept when the buyer pays for the item.
Param structure:
payment_methods[0] = string
payment_methods[1] = string

paypal_email.description: Valid PayPal email address for the PayPal account that the seller will use if they offer PayPal as a payment method for the listing.

price.description: Defines product's price that has to be added

quantity.description: Defines product's quantity that has to be added

return_accepted.description: Indicates whether the seller allows the buyer to return the item.

sales_tax.description:
Percent of an item's price to be charged as the sales tax for the order.
Param structure:
sales_tax[tax_percent] = decimal (##.###)
sales_tax[tax_state] = string
sales_tax[shipping_inc_in_tax] = bool

shipping_details.description:
The shipping details, including flat and calculated shipping costs and shipping insurance costs.
Param structure:
shipping_details[shipping_type] = string
shipping_details[0][shipping_service] = string
shipping_details[0][shipping_cost] = decimal
shipping_details[1][shipping_service] = string
shipping_details[1][shipping_cost] = decimal

shipping_template_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping template associated with the products in Etsy.

sku.description: Defines product's sku that has to be added

special_price.description: Defines product's model that has to be added

sprice_create.description: Defines the date of special price creation

sprice_expire.description: Defines the term of special price offer duration

sprice_modified.description: Defines the date of special price modification

tax_class_id.description: Defines tax classes where entity has to be added

upc.description: Universal Product Code. A UPC (UPC-A) is a commonly used identifer for many different products.

viewed_count.description: Specifies the number of product's reviews

custom_fields.description: This parameter sets the list of params to the shopping cart.

db_tables_prefix.description: This parameter is deprecated for this method. Please, use this parameter in method account.config.update

address_book_address1.description: Specifies customer's first address in the address book

address_book_address2.description: Specifies customer's second address in the address book

address_book_city.description: Specifies customer's city in the address book

address_book_company.description: Specifies customer's company name in the address book

address_book_country.description: ISO code or name of country

address_book_default.description: Defines whether the address is used by default

address_book_fax.description: Specifies customer's fax in the address book

address_book_first_name.description: Specifies customer's first name in the address book

address_book_last_name.description: Specifies customer's last name in the address book

address_book_phone.description: Specifies customer's phone number in the address book

address_book_state.description: ISO code or name of state.

address_book_website.description: Specifies customer's website in the address book

group.description: Defines the group where the customer

news_letter_subscription.description: Defines whether the newsletter subscription is available for the user

customer_email.description: Defines the customer specified by email for whom order has to be created

date.description: Specifies an order creation date in format Y-m-d H:i:s

gift_certificate_discount.description: Discounts for order with gift certificates

order_id.description: Defines the order id if it is supported by the cart

order_item_id.description: Defines orders specified by order item id

order_item_model.description: Defines orders specified by order item model

order_item_name.description: Defines orders specified by order item name

order_item_option_name.description: Ordered Product Option Name. Where x is order item ID, y is order item option ID

order_item_option_price.description: Ordered product option price Where x is order item ID, y - order item option ID

order_item_option_value.description: Ordered product option value Where x is order item ID, y - order item option ID

order_item_price.description: Defines orders specified by order item price

order_item_quantity.description: Defines orders specified by order item quantity

order_item_tax.description: Percentage of tax for product order

order_item_variant_id.description: Ordered product variant. Where x is order item ID

send_notifications.description: Send notifications to customer after order was created

store_id.description: Defines store id where the order should be assigned

subtotal_price.description: Total price of all ordered products multiplied by their number, excluding tax, shipping price and discounts

tax_price.description: The value of tax cost for order

total_paid.description: Defines total paid amount for the order

date.description: Specifies an order creation date in format Y-m-d H:i:s

item_restock.description: Boolean, whether or not to add the line items back to the store inventory.

items.description: Defines items in the order that will be shipped

message.description: Refund reason, or some else message which assigned to refund.

order_id.description: Defines the order for which the refund will be created.

send_notifications.description: Send notifications to customer after refund was created

items.description: Defines items in the order that will be shipped

order_id.description: Defines the order for which the shipment will be created

send_notifications.description: Send notifications to customer after shipment was created

shipment_provider.description: Defines company name that provide tracking of shipment

tracking_numbers.description:
Defines shipment's tracking numbers that have to be added
How set tracking numbers to appropriate carrier:
  • tracking_numbers[]=a2c.demo1,a2c.demo2 - set default carrier
  • tracking_numbers[carrier_id]=a2c.demo - set appropriate carrier
To get the list of carriers IDs that are available in your store, use the cart.info method

order_id.description: Defines the order that will be updated

shipment_id.description: Shipment id indicates the number of delivery

tracking_numbers.description:
Defines shipment's tracking numbers that have to be added
How set tracking numbers to appropriate carrier:
  • tracking_numbers[]=a2c.demo1,a2c.demo2 - set default carrier
  • tracking_numbers[carrier_id]=a2c.demo - set appropriate carrier
To get the list of carriers IDs that are available in your store, use the cart.info method

attribute_name.description: Defines product‚Äôs attribute name separated with a comma in Magento

attribute_set_name.description: Defines product‚Äôs attribute set name in Magento

available_for_sale.description: Specifies the set of visible/invisible products for sale

available_for_view.description: Specifies the set of visible/invisible products for users

best_offer.description:
The price at which Best Offers are automatically accepted.
Param structure:
best_offer[minimum_offer_price] = decimal
best_offer[auto_accept_price] = decimal

categories_ids.description: Defines product add that is specified by comma-separated categories id

condition.description: The human-readable label for the condition (e.g., "New").

created_at.description: Defines the date of entity creation

description.description: Defines product's description that has to be added

downloadable.description: Defines whether the product is downloadable

ean.description: European Article Number. An EAN is a unique 8 or 13-digit identifier that many industries (such as book publishers) use to identify products.

isbn.description: International Standard Book Number. An ISBN is a unique identifier for books.

listing_duration.description: Describes the number of days the seller wants the listing to be active.

listing_type.description: Indicates the selling format of the eBay listing.

meta_description.description: Defines unique meta description of a entity

meta_keywords.description: Defines unique meta keywords for each entity

meta_title.description: Defines unique meta title for each entity

model.description: Defines product's model that has to be added

name.description: Defines product's name that has to be added

ordered_count.description: Defines how many times the product was ordered

package_details.description:
If the seller is subscribed to "Business Policies", use the seller_profiles instead of the shipping_details, payment_methods and return_accepted params.
Param structure:
package_details[measure_unit] = string
Allowed measure_unit values: [English or Metric]
Default: Metric
package_details[weigh_unit] = string
Allowed weigh_unit values: [kg, g, lbs, oz]
package_details[package_depth] = decimal
package_details[package_length] = decimal
package_details[package_width] = decimal
package_details[weight_major] = decimal
package_details[weight_minor] = decimal
package_details[shipping_package] = string
See cart.info method, param `eBay_shipping_package_details`

payment_methods.description:
Identifies the payment method (such as PayPal) that the seller will accept when the buyer pays for the item.
Param structure:
payment_methods[0] = string
payment_methods[1] = string

paypal_email.description: Valid PayPal email address for the PayPal account that the seller will use if they offer PayPal as a payment method for the listing.

price.description: Defines product's price that has to be added

quantity.description: Defines product's quantity that has to be added

return_accepted.description: Indicates whether the seller allows the buyer to return the item.

sales_tax.description:
Percent of an item's price to be charged as the sales tax for the order.
Param structure:
sales_tax[tax_percent] = decimal (##.###)
sales_tax[tax_state] = string
sales_tax[shipping_inc_in_tax] = bool

shipping_details.description:
The shipping details, including flat and calculated shipping costs and shipping insurance costs.
Param structure:
shipping_details[shipping_type] = string
shipping_details[0][shipping_service] = string
shipping_details[0][shipping_cost] = decimal
shipping_details[1][shipping_service] = string
shipping_details[1][shipping_cost] = decimal

shipping_template_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping template associated with the products in Etsy.

sku.description: Defines product's sku that has to be added

special_price.description: Defines product's model that has to be added

sprice_create.description: Defines the date of special price creation

sprice_expire.description: Defines the term of special price offer duration

sprice_modified.description: Defines the date of special price modification

tax_class_id.description: Defines tax classes where entity has to be added

upc.description: Universal Product Code. A UPC (UPC-A) is a commonly used identifer for many different products.

viewed_count.description: Specifies the number of product's reviews

product_id.description: Defines the product to which the price has to be added
Defines the product where the price has to be updated

name.description: Defines tax class name where tax has to be added

product_id.description: Defines products specified by product id

tax_rates.description: Defines tax rates of specified tax classes

id.description: Defines the variant to which the price has to be added
Defines the variant where the price has to be updated
